entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow or rain early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
